      Integer getWaitlistLimit()
      Retrieves the waitlist limit for the event, if any.
      Returns:
      the waitlist limit as an Integer, or null if no limit is set

    • setWaitlistLimit

      void setWaitlistLimit(Integer waitlistLimit)
      Sets an optional limit for the number of entrants on the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      waitlistLimit - the maximum number of entrants allowed on the waitlist, or null for unlimited

    • getGeolocationEnabled
